Class Order

java.lang.Object
com.greengrocer.models.Order
public class Order extends Object
Represents an order in the Greengrocer system. Orders track customer purchases, delivery status, and invoices.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description

    Default constructor.

      public Order(int userId, double subtotal, double vat, double totalCost, LocalDateTime requestedDelivery)

      Parameters:
      userId - Customer ID
      subtotal - Order subtotal
      vat - VAT amount
      totalCost - Total cost
      requestedDelivery - Requested delivery time
